author: Karl Markus Kiudma
title: Authmn in Tartu
text: Tartu is very beutiful in authmn!

author: Rene Dapon
title: Relaxing by the Lake
text: Spent the afternoon by Peipsi lake. Perfect weather and calm water.

author: Tregert Gustav Värv
title: First Snow!
text: First snow has fallen and the city looks magical!

author: Rene Dapon
title: Weekend with Friends
text: Had a great time hiking with my best friends. Fresh air and laughter!

author: Karl Markus Kiudma
title: Cool Posts
text: These are some really cool posts worth checking out!

author: Tregert Gustav Värv
title: Morning walk in Meenikunno bog
text: A peaceful day surrounded by nature. Meenikunno bog never disappoints — sunshine, silence and pure Estonian beauty.

author: Karl Markus Kiudma
title: Weekend disc golf round
text: Tried out a new disc golf course this weekend — great weather, challenging fairways and a few birdies too!

author: Rene Dapon
title: Beach Grind Festival
text: Unreal energy at Beach Grind this summer — fire shows, loud music and thousands of people having the time of their lives!

author: Tregert Gustav Värv
title: Climbing new heights
text: Reaching the top isn’t just about the view — it’s about every step, every challenge, and every moment you kept going.

author: Karl Markus Kiudma
title: Focus mode
text: Coding through the night with coffee, headphones and pure concentration — when the world is quiet, code just flows.
